hero.heading: Explore the world of learning with us
hero.description: Discover expert-led courses in technology, business, arts, and more. Download and learn at your own pace, anywhere, anytime.

dataScience.title: Data Science
dataScience.description: Master data analysis and machine learning

completionRate.title: Course Completion Rate
completionRate.description: Our offline learning feature helps students complete courses even with limited connectivity, resulting in industry-leading completion rates.

expertLed.title: Expert-Led Courses
expertLed.description: Courses crafted by industry professionals and academic experts

learningAccess.title: Learning Access
learningAccess.description: Download once, learn anytime, anywhere, even offline

activeStudents.title: Active Students
activeStudents.description: Join our global community of lifelong learners

satisfactionRate.title: Satisfaction Rate
satisfactionRate.description: Consistently high ratings across all course categories

offlineFeature.heading: Hassle-free learning experience
offlineFeature.description: Download courses and continue learning offline. No interruptions, no excuses. Our app synchronizes your progress when you're back online.

downloadCourses.title: Download full courses
downloadCourses.description: Save videos, resources, and assessments for offline use

learnWithoutInternet.title: Learn without internet
learnWithoutInternet.description: Continue your education regardless of connectivity

autoSync.title: Auto-sync progress
autoSync.description: Seamlessly synchronize your progress when back online

details.heading: We take care of all the details
details.description: Our platform is designed with your learning journey in mind, providing all the tools and resources you need to succeed.

expertCurriculum.title: Expert-Crafted Curriculum
expertCurriculum.description: Each course is meticulously designed by industry experts and academics to provide relevant, up-to-date knowledge and skills.

offlineLearning.title: Complete Offline Learning
offlineLearning.description: Download entire courses including videos, quizzes, and resources to learn anywhere, even without internet connection.

certifications.title: Recognized Certifications
certifications.description: Earn industry-recognized certificates upon course completion to enhance your resume and professional credentials.

support.title: 24/7 Learning Support
support.description: Our dedicated support team and community forums ensure you never get stuck, providing assistance whenever you need it.

auth.title: EduAfri
auth.description: Access educational content offline across Africa
